body.name: Trueque Wireless Mouse E702 2.4GHz Portable Computer Mouse with USB Receiver, Comfortable Silent Mice for Laptop, Chromebook, PC, Notebook, Desktop, Windows, Mac (Blue&Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Plug & Play, Wireless Convenience】The 2.4 GHz wireless mouse provides a powerful, reliable connection, effective up to 33ft of range, effectively eliminates delays, dropouts, and interference, freeing you from wired troubles. Simply plug the USB receiver into your computer or laptop to start working in seconds, no drivers need to be installed. Snap-in USB receiver stows conveniently in the bottom of the wireless mouse. So you don't accidentally lose it while traveling.

【Silent & High-Precision Wireless Mouse】The computer mouse buttons use mute buttons to reduce the click noise by more than 90%, and passed the 3 Million times keystroke test to guarantee superb durability. 1600 DPI movement resolution enables responsive cursor control for precise tracking, works on most surfaces.

【Portable & Ergonomic Design】This computer mouse is back to the classics, with a streamlined arc design, ergonomic grip and symmetrical left and right, which can reduce the pressure on your hands, wrists and arms caused by long-term use, and will not be fatigued after long hours of work and study. The buttons are made of high-gloss material, simple and stylish, and the portable design makes it easy to store in a travel bag, compact and portable, very suitable for travel.

【Power Saving and Long-Lasting】The mouse for laptop only needs one AA battery, with a built-in three-speed sleep solution, which saves power and consumes less power and prolongs battery life. After the mouse for laptop enters the power saving mode, you can move the for laptop or click any button to wake it up. Note: powered by 1*AA battery (not included).

【Wide Compatibility & Great Service】This USB mouse is compatible with Windows 2000, ME, XP(X64), Vista, 7, 8, 10, Linux and Mac OS X 10.4 or above; as well as compatible for Chromebook, PC, Laptop, Notebook, Computer and MacBook.【Pls Note: this USB mouse is connected by USB receiver, will NOT compatible with Mac book Pro or other devices which only have Type C ports】

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price works well
reviews.reviewText: Light bluish/ mint color. Small, comfortable and works fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and comfortable mouse
reviews.reviewText: My older mouse died officially after three years of use, I needed a new one for grading (HS English teacher). Decided to go with this one as it was cheaper, liked the color and had decent reviews. It is very quiet to use in the classroom when students are working and fits perfectly in my hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the vibrant color of this mouse. Install was very easy and works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty pink computer mouse. My daughter loves it so I bought myself one too. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't Turn Off
reviews.reviewText: There is no "on-off" switch. Wish I had realized this prior to my purchase. It stays on all the time. I bought this for my child to bring to school and I feel like it uses up the battery much faster than it would if we could choose to shut it off while not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Trueque E702 Wireless Mouse: Stylish, Silent, and Portable Computing in Pink"
reviews.reviewText: The Trueque Wireless Mouse E702 is a compact and portable companion for your computer needs. Operating on a 2.4GHz frequency with a USB receiver, it ensures reliable connectivity. The mouse's silent operation is a plus, offering a comfortable experience for laptop, Chromebook, PC, notebook, and desktop users. Available in an attractive pink color, it adds a touch of style to your setup. Ideal for both Windows and Mac systems, this wireless mouse is a practical and aesthetically pleasing choice for on-the-go computing.
